data.title: William Howard Taft was Born at Cincinnati, Ohio
data.meta_description: September 15, 1857,  William Howard Taft, the first Civil Governor of the Philippines, and the 27th President of the United States, was born at Cincinnati, Ohio. His father was Alphonso Taft, a prominent Republican attorney who served as secretary of war and attorney general under President Ulysses S. Grant,  then ambassador to Austria-Hungary and Russia under President Chester A. Arthur.
